questions.question: Who can apply for this ticket?
questions.answer: Anyone and Everyone can apply for this ticket.

questions.question: Why should I apply for this ticket?
questions.answer: You get priority access to Devfest Indore 2023, including Food and Swags. Additonally, you get open access to all the events organised by GDG Indore, GDG Cloud Indore, TFUG Indore and WTM Indore for the next 6 months.

questions.question: What is the cost for this ticket?
questions.answer: This is a donation based ticket. You can avail it any amount greater than â‚¹500.

questions.question: What is the cost for this ticket?
Who can apply for this ticket?
questions.answer: This ticket is open to everyone.

questions.question: Does registering for this ticket confirm my entry to Devfest 2023?
questions.answer: No. This ticket is based on approval. We have limited seats for the event. Based on the total registrations, our team will sort out the participants. Priority is given to Experienced Professionals over Students. If you are selected, you will recieve the approval email from our side.

questions.question: I really want to attend Devfest 2023. What should I do?
questions.answer: This ticket does not confirm your registration. If you want a confirmed registration, please go for the Community Support Ticket.

Who can apply for this ticket?
questions.answer: This ticket is open to only Professionals. If you are a student, please do not fill this form and go for General Access Ticket.

questions.answer: No. This ticket is based on approval. We have limited seats for the event. Based on the total registrations, our team will sort out the participants based on your details. Please do not fill this form if you are not a working professional. When you are selected, you will recieve the approval email from our side.

questions.answer: This ticket is open to only Startup Founders. If you are a student or an employee, please do not fill this form and go for General Access Ticket or Professionals Ticket.
